prime.gui.styling.TextStyle

type
class
extends
StyleSubBlock
available in
swf
metadata
:build
'???'
:keep
Class holding all style properties for fonts. Font properties are also inheritable of the container object.

Constructor

new(?filledProps : Int, ?size : Int, ?family : String, ?embeddedFont : Bool, ?color : prime.types.RGBA, ?weight : prime.gui.text.FontWeight, ?style : prime.gui.text.FontStyle, ?letterSpacing : Float, ?align : prime.gui.text.TextAlign, ?decoration : prime.gui.text.TextDecoration, ?indent : Float, ?transform : prime.gui.text.TextTransform, ?textWrap : Bool, ?columnCount : Int, ?columnGap : Int, ?columnWidth : Int)

invalidateCall(changeFromOther : Int, sender : prime.core.traits.IInvalidatable) : Void

overrides prime.gui.styling.StyleSubBlock
Method is called when a property in the parent-, super-, extended- or nested-style is changed. If the property is not set in this style-object, it means that the allFilledPropertiesFlag needs to be changed..
